Articles.Content: Is anyone else having an issue getting the download? I try to download it but it just simply wont do it, i have tried Chrome, Firefox, and IE i have tried disabling adblocker and even my antivirus.
seen the new OP and got all warm and fuzzy inside, then read newest posts and am now waiting for the weekend. Damn now i got the song "working for the weekend" stuck in my head!
I expected more people to be here all ecstatic and stuff when 4.08 went up...

I expected more people to be here all ecstatic and stuff when 4.08 went up...

It's because in some countries, it is night. Though it is unexpected that it went up so suddenly. Also, the SST now has a grey paint job! Screenshots coming as soon as I start rebuilding of my Space Station "Orion".
BUG REPORT!!! Both the heavy duty wheels and the sedan wheels don't need electricity to run. It seems they consume it, but don't need it to run.

I expected more people to be here all ecstatic and stuff when 4.08 went up...

Or they went straight to playing
Hot damn, phase 4 is here! Time to start making new plans for the Surface Unified Research Facilities in Advanced Cis-Munar Environments, otherwise known as SURFACE, or a Mun Base...

Possable bug report, 32 bit KSP with heavy mods. Wheels are not staying on the surface of the runway, chopper will not go down to land. Will attempt to try on a stock non-modded version of KSP. Just to make sure there is not another mod screwing with this one. Thanks for the release looks Great so far.
Jackpot! Downloading now.
Awesome! Trying it out right now!

With the Kerbostar it's alot easier getting up the mountain to work on my transmitter tower. It's located in the mountain range just behind KSC. About 50 km away.

Luckely it wasn't that clouded or I would have flown into the side of those mountains. The controls however do take getting used to, landing does take some practice. Other then that nice work.
The wheels sink into the ground because they are facing the wrong way. You have to orient them correctly for them to function. Look for an arrow on the inside of the wheel.
Having fun experimenting with the new Kerbostar. Here's my first successful helipad landing:

!!! It's here! It's here!!!

There's some excitement for ya!

OMG YES! Thanks you Helldiver for the awesome mod!

Can you make a torrent download link? I must wait 1h for all the phases to download ...

For anyone who is using TAC life support you need to edit the MM_AddResources file, the coach has 9 crew and the file only goes up to 6 crew so as is it won't have the resources onboard.

Just add that to the file. I've gone up to 9 crew. The values should match up with the rest.

@PART[*]:HAS[#CrewCapacity[7],@MODULE[ModuleCommand],!RESOURCE[Food]]:FOR[TacLifeSupport]:NEEDS[!modularFuelTanks&!RealFuels]
{
	// 7 crew
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Food
		amount = 4.26
		maxAmount = 4.26
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Water
		amount = 9.45
		maxAmount = 9.45
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Oxygen
		amount = 1597.40
		maxAmount = 1597.40
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = CarbonDioxide
		amount = 0
		maxAmount = 1374.38
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Waste
		amount = 0
		maxAmount = 3.75
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = WasteWater
		amount = 0
		maxAmount = 10.43
	}
}

@PART[*]:HAS[#CrewCapacity[8],@MODULE[ModuleCommand],!RESOURCE[Food]]:FOR[TacLifeSupport]:NEEDS[!modularFuelTanks&!RealFuels]
{
	// 8 crew
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Food
		amount = 4.97
		maxAmount = 4.97
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Water
		amount = 10.80
		maxAmount = 10.80
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Oxygen
		amount = 1825.60
		maxAmount = 1825.60
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = CarbonDioxide
		amount = 0
		maxAmount = 1570.72
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Waste
		amount = 0
		maxAmount = 4.44
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = WasteWater
		amount = 0
		maxAmount = 11.92
	}
}

@PART[*]:HAS[#CrewCapacity[9],@MODULE[ModuleCommand],!RESOURCE[Food]]:FOR[TacLifeSupport]:NEEDS[!modularFuelTanks&!RealFuels]
{
	// 9 crew
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Food
		amount = 5.68
		maxAmount = 5.68
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Water
		amount = 12.15
		maxAmount = 12.15
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Oxygen
		amount = 2053.80
		maxAmount = 2053.80
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = CarbonDioxide
		amount = 0
		maxAmount = 1767.06
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Waste
		amount = 0
		maxAmount = 5.13
	}
	RESOURCE
	{
		name = WasteWater
		amount = 0
		maxAmount = 13.41
	}
}

Edited August 22, 2014 by Lekke
Has anyone know there it's stairs on KSC's buildings you can actually climb them? I discover that today. XD
Holy cow, what an addon
Hell yeah! It's here!

Bravo, sir!!! Awesome work. As always

I'd suggest to make a low-res packages as well(png instead of tga).

I'm experiencing some problems with the fire engine that make it un-usable. Whenever I change scenes, or come back to it, there is a chance it will appear with the green texture and no wheels and the crew dead. It then slows my game down really badly and I have to force quit.

There is a problem when there is so 3 cars in KSC the game lags the hell out,it makes flying helos and launching shuttles impossible,I tried to make it a real life launch with the emergency vehicles ready but it just lags the hell out,can you find a way to fix this,I switched to my massive space station and there isn't any lag so the mod is the problem,can you try look into it?

I'm experiencing some problems with the fire engine that make it un-usable. Whenever I change scenes, or come back to it, there is a chance it will appear with the green texture and no wheels and the crew dead. It then slows my game down really badly and I have to force quit. http://i.imgur.com/o2qa3or.png

It happened to me once I'm not too sure but surely helldiver will fix it

Good grief, the Kerbostar landing skids are...skiddy. I can't land on the VAB without sliding off. They're Teflon coated!

Edit: Never mind, they've got brakes!

Edit2: The KMW Heavy Duty tyres fall through the runway on launch. Collider issue?

Edit3: This happens with all the wheels. The rover wheels on the right side tried to 'steer' up and down!

Edited August 22, 2014 by colmo
Re-installed the vehicles pack and the wheels work fine. Weird.....
